employees.notes: Proff reports 52 employees for Veidekke ASA.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports operating revenue (Sum driftsinntekter) of 133 000, with amounts stated in thousands of NOK; converted value is NOK 133,000,000.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: The Norwegian legal entity was resolved as Veidekke ASA (allmennaksjeselskap) with org number 917 103 801 on Proff.[1]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Veidekke discloses inbound use of secondary materials in operations, including recycled steel inputs in Veidekke Prefab and recycled concrete aggregate in concrete initiatives/projects.[2][3][4] Evidence is strongest at business-unit/project level, with limited group-wide volume disclosure.[2][3][4]

srm_inputs.label: Recycled rebar steel in prefab concrete elements
srm_inputs.used_for: Veidekke Prefab states recycled reinforcing steel is used in its production of concrete elements.[2]
srm_inputs.tier_reasoning: The statement that only recycled rebar is used indicates established, non-pilot use in that business unit.[2]

share.context: The Prefab page states that only 100% recycled rebar steel is used.[2]

srm_inputs.volume_notes: No direct annual mass/energy quantity is disclosed for this input in the reviewed source.[2]
srm_inputs.uncertainties: Disclosure is for Veidekke Prefab and may not represent all Veidekke ASA business units.[2]

srm_inputs.label: Scrap-iron-based wire for hollow-core slabs
material_examples: Wire for hollow-core slabs containing scrap iron
srm_inputs.used_for: In Prefab production, wire used for hollow-core slabs is described as containing scrap iron.[2]
srm_inputs.tier_reasoning: An explicit 86% scrap-iron content indicates meaningful integration of secondary metal feedstock in that product input.[2]

share.context: The Prefab page specifies 86% scrap iron content in wire for hollow-core slabs.[2]

srm_inputs.volume_notes: Only composition share is disclosed; no annual tonnage is provided.[2]
srm_inputs.uncertainties: Scope appears limited to the cited Prefab activity and specific wire application.[2]

srm_inputs.label: Recycled concrete/return masses as aggregate input
srm_inputs.used_for: Veidekke sources describe use of recycled aggregate in concrete and replacement of virgin aggregate with recycled concrete in a pilot context.[2][3][4]
srm_inputs.tier_reasoning: Evidence includes pilot and project-level implementation (e.g., Ulven pilot and specific project descriptions), but lacks company-wide scale data.[3][4]
srm_inputs.volume_notes: The reviewed sources provide qualitative/project-level statements, but no direct annual quantity of recycled aggregate input.[2][3][4]
srm_inputs.uncertainties: Some statements are pilot-oriented and may not indicate routine use across all projects or all business units.[3][4]

gaps_and_uncertainties: No group-level annual tonnage (t/kg) or energy-volume data for SRM inbound inputs was found in the reviewed public sources.[2][3][4]
Several SRM claims are business-unit or pilot/project specific, limiting certainty about total Veidekke ASA-wide SRM input share.[2][3][4]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn Veidekke ASA Org nr 917 103 801
evidence.claim: Legal entity name is Veidekke ASA with this org number.
Operating revenue figure for 2024 is 133 000 (thousand-unit table).
Financial table currency is NOK and values are in thousands.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Vi bruker kun sprengte fjellmasser og returmasser i vår produksjon.
evidence.claim: Prefab production uses return masses as aggregate input.
Prefab uses fully recycled rebar steel input.

evidence.evidence_snippet: vår wire til hulldekker består av 86% skrapjern
evidence.claim: Wire input for hollow-core slabs contains 86% scrap iron.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Ved å bruke kun lavkarbon ekstrem-betong med resirkulert tilslag
evidence.claim: Project concrete input includes recycled aggregate.

evidence.evidence_snippet: I vår gjennomførte vi et vellykket fullskala testprosjekt
evidence.claim: Veidekke reported a successful full-scale test project for circular concrete input.

evidence.evidence_snippet: erstatte alt jomfruelig tilslag i betongen med resirkulert betong fra et riveprosjekt
evidence.claim: Veidekke describes replacing virgin aggregate with recycled concrete from demolition.

sources.title: Veidekke ASA - Org.nr. 917 103 801 - Oslo - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
Veidekke: Etablerer selskap for sirkulære løsninger
